title: In the Beginning
theme: Creation myth - the universe counts itself into existence through primordial elements
narrative_arc: In darkness, a single stroke -> Numbers stack and multiply -> The mouth speaks them -> Celestial bodies mark time -> The field sustains -> The eye witnesses all
narrative_story: In primordial darkness, a single stroke appeared—ONE. Loneliness drove it to duplicate, becoming TWO parallel lines. A third joined them, stacking like ascending steps: THREE. Four boundaries enclosed space for the first time—FOUR, the initial container. Five strokes converged at a crossing: FIVE, a meeting point. Reality folded as SIX completed an enclosure. Children drew light with a skyward slash: SEVEN. Wings spread wide in separation: EIGHT. A questioning curve bent like a hook: NINE. A cross marked the destination: TEN—the universe had counted itself into being. Yet who performed this counting? A perfect square opened: the MOUTH that spoke numbers. This mouth observed the DAY, a blazing window to the sun. Beside it gleamed the MONTH, a crescent measuring cycles. Below stretched the RICE FIELD, sustaining existence. Reflected in its waters gazed the EYE, witnessing everything. The cosmos awakened through observation.

characters.mnemonic_image: A single horizontal stroke - the first mark in the void
characters.story: In primordial darkness, I trace the first stroke. I SING 'YEEE!' - sustained and eternal - and ONE line blazes across the void, creating existence itself.
Loneliness drives me to duplicate. 'ARR!' I COMMAND - and the line SPLITS into TWO. Parallel but forever separate, my creation doubles in isolation.

characters.mnemonic_image: Three lines stacking like ascending steps
characters.story: A third stroke joins them. I SING 'SAAAHN!' as I climb THREE ascending steps toward light - my voice sustained, building upward through the layers of reality.

characters.mnemonic_image: Four boundaries enclosing space - the first container
characters.story: FOUR boundaries snap shut around me - the first cage. 'SEE!' I COMMAND the walls, trapped inside my own creation. Space itself becomes a prison.

characters.mnemonic_image: Strokes converging at a crossing - the meeting point
characters.story: FIVE strokes converge at the crossing point - I stand at the center of everything. I GROAN 'Wuuuu...' as the weight of being the hub crushes down, low and creaky.
characters.narrative_position: The center point where all lines meet

characters.mnemonic_image: A lid over diverging strokes - reality folding closed
characters.story: Reality folds closed around me. 'LYOW!' I COMMAND the lid to seal - SIX directions of space now trapped. I am the lion sealing my own cage.

characters.mnemonic_image: A crossed slash - drawing light through darkness
characters.story: I slash SEVEN sparklers across the void, SINGING 'CHEE!' - sustained and bright. Light exists for the first time, my voice holding each streak against the dark.

characters.mnemonic_image: Wings spreading wide - separation and possibility
characters.story: I RIP possibility in half - EIGHT directions explode outward like wings. I SING 'BAAAH!' as paths diverge, sustained chorus of becoming, everything spreading.

characters.mnemonic_image: A questioning curve, a hook reaching for completion
characters.story: NINE hooks snag my flesh as I reach for completion. I GROAN 'Jiuuu...' - low and desperate - so close to finishing, the curve bending toward the end.
characters.narrative_position: Approaching but not yet reaching wholeness

characters.mnemonic_image: A cross marking the destination - completion achieved
characters.story: The cross marks completion - TEN! I GASP 'SHIH?!' in shocked surprise. The universe has counted itself into being. My voice rises at what I've created.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising awe at creation complete

characters.mnemonic_image: A perfect square opening - the mouth that spoke numbers
characters.story: But who performed this counting? My MOUTH unhinges into a perfect square. I GROAN 'Kohhhh...' - the low, creaky voice that spoke all numbers into existence.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural realization of self as speaker

characters.mnemonic_image: A blazing window - the sun observed by the counting mouth
characters.story: My mouth observes the DAY blazing through. 'REE!' the SUN COMMANDS me awake. ONE bar of light inside the box - time begins its march.
characters.narrative_position: The first celestial body marks day

characters.mnemonic_image: A crescent measuring cycles - time's other marker
characters.story: Beside the sun gleams the MOON. 'YUE!' it COMMANDS the tides. I watch as MONTHS pass in its crescent rhythm - time's other wheel turning.
characters.narrative_position: Lunar cycles begin - time becomes measurable

characters.mnemonic_image: A geometric grid - the field that sustains existence
characters.story: Below me stretches the FIELD that sustains all life. I GASP 'TYEN?!' - stepping in, the mud SWALLOWS my legs. Four plots hold me fast, surprising and inescapable.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising shock at the earth's grip
characters.narrative_position: The earth becomes cultivated - life can be sustained

characters.mnemonic_image: Two eyelids blinking - the eye that witnesses everything
characters.story: Reflected in the field's waters gazes the EYE - MY eye. 'MOO!' I COMMAND my vision to see it all. TWO eyelids blink. The cosmos awakens through observation.
characters.narrative_position: The observer emerges - consciousness witnesses creation
